title: 24 hrs to woo the ERG and DUP as Spartans switch to back Boris Johnson's Brexit deal
text:
They plan to spend the next 24 hours poring over the details and seeking legal advice, but for the so-called Spartans the question of whether to support Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal has become a purely political one.

The EU may have ruled out extending Article 50 in the face of the deal agreed at Thursday's Brussels summit - but for Tory members of the European Research Group (ERG), it is no longer a case of deal or no deal - but deal or no Brexit.

For if they vote down Mr Johnson’s proposals on Saturday, they know they not only risk a collapse in popular support for the Prime Minister but opening the door to a Corbyn-led coalition calling for a second referendum.

As one prominent Brexiteer put...
description: They plan to spend the next 24 hours poring over the details and seeking legal advice, but for the so-called Spartans the question of whether to support Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal has become a purely political one.
